title: The Hidden curriculum: expectations
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Women in education
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Australia - Curricula
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Stereotype (Psychology)
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Attitude (Psychology)
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Gender roles in children
description: Looks at sex stereotyping in schools. A female teacher and her children discuss the reaction of the children to the teacher's engagement, and to boys carrying out some activities often thought of as female-oriented, e.g. cooking, sewing. Also includes a discussion between a female principal and other teachers about women at the top and pupils choosing a course/sport regardless of gender. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
